body:
# Ultimate reliability stress(storage) test 

The ultimate goal of this project is to provide flexible and extendable framework for stress testing of different subsistem in IT infrastructure.

Initially we aim at the multiplatform indeterministic IO stress test, which allows to spot possible and hardly detectable bugs and flaws in the designs of the IO subsystems.
name: URST
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
